AggOO::svg::path_vertices

AggOO::svg::path_vertices Class Reference

#include <agg_svg_path_vertices.h>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

void render_shape_data (const agg::trans_affine &mtx, std::vector< SVGShapeData > &shapes)

Detailed Description

A reimplementation of the agg::svg::path_renderer which allows for retrieving the path vertices.

Member Function Documentation

void AggOO::svg::path_vertices::render_shape_data ( const agg::trans_affine &  mtx,
std::vector< SVGShapeData > &  shapes 
) [inline]

"Render" the shapes to an array. The idea is to tessellate the curves so that the vertices will resemble the original shapes as much as possible.
